title: Vayne isn't broken because of the 3AD.
body:
She's broken because her kit has everything.

Really you should have gutted her stealth time to 0.5s max, there, fixed easily.

replies.body: The best way to balance Vayne is to buff her and remove Vayne true damage and replace it with magic damage, so that tanks can focus Vayne, without dying so quick. Her invisible is completely fine since you can place a pink ward. This kind of buff will add more counter plays against Vayne when it comes to items
Yeah buy thorn mail against a champion that does true damage. -__-
the 3AD removal would mean that Vayne doesn't get as much cs early game as she otherwise might have.

When vayne is behind she is terrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrible dude. And based on your team comp thats going to mean the only person who can carry could maybe be the midlaner. I know a toplaner can carry and same with jg and supp but adc and mid are generally the carry roles.
